title: Antique Shop『BEAR』 - Novel Updates
tags: Affair   Antique Shop   Cannibalism   Cruel Characters   Death   Episodic   Family Conflict   Jealousy   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists   Murders   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Psychopaths   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Store Owner   Thriller   Twisted Personality
author: Kyousha   華
description: An antique shop “BEAR” operates late at night. Each item sold there has its own particular significance. Once you step into the shop, you will find yourself in another world that is as beautiful as a dream. You are enticed there by a mysterious owner. What kind of terrors are trapped in those products is something to look forward to once you have read it.>
